snippet.title: Australia's love affair with Chris Lilley is finally over. And good riddance, too.
snippet.content: Oh dear. Last weekend Chris Lilley reminded the world that he existed and ... it didn't end well. In fact, it was all kinds of awful. With the comedian having recently garnered media attention in the wake of his most recent series, Jonah From Tonga, being axed from , the publicity wing of Lilley's flailing one-man empire decided on a somewhat unusual strategy to restore public favour.
